resources.string:
"The (Official) AIT Purity Test was inspired by the Rice Purity Test " "and serves as a segue from college life at US colleges to true study " "abroad life at the Acquincum Institute of Technology, Budapest. Itâ€™s " "a voluntary opportunity for the AIT student groups to bond, and for" "students to track the maturation of their experiences throughout their " "study abroad semester.

" "Caution: This is not a bucket list. Completion of all items on this test does not make you cooler.

"

string-array.name: surveyQuestions
string-array.item: Did you go to one country other than Hungary?
Did you visit at least two countries outside of Hungary?
Did you visit at least three countries outside of Hungary?
Did you visit at least four countries outside of Hungary?
Did you visit five or more countries outside of Hungary?
